Hi there! I'm Richard and this is my website. Personally and professionally my top focus is to learn and be a sponge to everything. I love problem solving with technology, which I get to do in my work every day at Slack.


I believe if we aren't learning, we aren't thriving.


Check out my about me page to learn more about me, and this post if you want to know why I built this site!
